Text: I thought the editing was very smooth and the video/audio of the VHS preferable to the MPI DVD (though not quite as good as the laserdisc edition). However, it was confusing near the end to see the Beatles at a night club in the evening and then the very next moment on a bus (in the daylight!) to be followed by the marathon race. The original edit makes more sense because everything takes place within a single day. Just my humble opinion.
I like it more than the original edit. I really appreciate dasjr effort. Keep up the good job.
